panels.description: Total storage capacity across all media volumes
panels.title: Total Capacity

panels.description: Total storage used across all media volumes
panels.title: Total Used

panels.description: Available storage space across all media volumes
panels.title: Available Space

panels.description: Overall storage usage percentage
panels.title: Usage Percentage

panels.description: Storage capacity usage across media PVCs
panels.title: Tower NFS Usage

panels.description: Storage capacity usage for tower-2 NFS
panels.title: Tower-2 NFS Usage

panels.description: Storage capacity usage for CephFS
panels.title: CephFS Usage

panels.description: Number of active migration pods (job indexes)
panels.title: Active Migration Pods

panels.description: Number of completed migration pods (job indexes)
panels.title: Completed Pods

panels.description: Number of failed migration pods (job indexes)
panels.title: Failed Pods

panels.description: CephFS write operations per second
panels.title: CephFS Write Activity

panels.description: rsync transfer statistics from structured log files (via log-tailer sidecar)
panels.title: Migration Statistics (rsync output)

panels.description: CPU usage percentage for Unraid NFS servers
panels.title: Unraid CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory usage percentage for Unraid NFS servers
panels.title: Unraid Memory Usage

panels.description: Network throughput (TX/RX) for Unraid NFS servers
panels.title: Unraid Network Throughput

panels.description: NFS server operations and throughput from Unraid servers
panels.title: Unraid NFS Server Throughput

panels.description: Storage usage trends for migration sources (NFS - decreasing) and destination (CephFS - increasing)
panels.title: Storage Capacity Over Time

panels.description: Total data remaining on source NFS volumes to migrate to CephFS
panels.title: Data Remaining (NFS Sources)

panels.description: Current write throughput to CephFS - shows migration speed
panels.title: Migration Transfer Rate

panels.description: CephFS metadata pool objects (files/directories). CephFS uses dynamic allocation without fixed inode limits.
panels.title: CephFS Objects (Files/Dirs)

panels.description: All migration job logs from structured log files (via log-tailer sidecar) - clean, sequential, no interleaving
panels.title: Full Migration Logs (Structured)

panels.description: CRITICAL: Directories that failed checksum verification (source NOT deleted)

targets.expr: count_over_time({namespace="media", job=~"media/migrate.*", container="log-tailer"} |= "Verification FAILED" [24h]) or vector(0)

panels.title: ⚠️ Verification Failures

panels.description: Number of directories being transferred concurrently (PARALLEL_JOBS setting)

targets.expr: last_over_time({namespace="media", job=~"media/migrate.*", container="log-tailer"} |= "Parallel Jobs:" | regexp `Parallel Jobs: (?P<parallel>\d+)` | unwrap parallel [1h])

panels.title: Parallel Jobs (Concurrency)

panels.description: Directories skipped due to checkpoint resume (shows resume is working)

targets.expr: count_over_time({namespace="media", job=~"media/migrate.*", container="log-tailer"} |= "SKIPPING" |= "already completed" [1h]) or vector(0)

panels.title: Checkpoint Resumes (1h)

panels.description: Latest progress report from active migrations
panels.title: Current Progress

panels.description: Directories completed per letter over time

targets.expr: sum by (pod) (count_over_time({namespace="media", job=~"media/migrate.*", container="log-tailer"} |= "✓ Source removed" [5m]))

panels.title: Migration Progress by Letter
